section.p: It is rather disheartening the way all the onlookers sigh and shake their heads the moment you give your answer.
‘Talanexor always gets them with that one!’ you overhear an old professor saying.

Having been judged loser in the dispute you have brought shame on your college if you belong to one, and are forthwith expelled.
Turn to 571
